desc.cn: Postman CLI 是由 Postman 开发、支持和签名的命令行配套工具
desc.en: The Postman CLI is the command-line companion that is developed, supported, and signed by Postman

win/powershell.cmd: x pwsh powershell.exe -NoProfile -InputFormat None -ExecutionPolicy AllSigned -Command "[System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://dl-cli.pstmn.io/install/win64.ps1'))"
